revised_title: Comparative Anatomy of Male and Female Opossum Reproductive Systems
tldr: In this article, William Cowper examines the differences in the male and female opossum reproductive systems. He describes the external and internal anatomy of the male opossum, focusing on the reproductive organs and their functions. Cowper also discusses the role of comparative anatomy in understanding the structure and function of various animal organs, including those of the opossum.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Comparative Anatomy
